parameters.name: AclEntryComment
parameters.description:
The remarks of the ACL entry.

It must be 2 to 100 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries returned on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The time when the network ACL was created. The time follows the `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` format.
